text: Toros Rasguélénian, real name of R. Toros (12 December 1934 – 29 July 2020) was a French sculptor. He settled in Valence, then in Romans-sur-Isère, both in the Drôme region. He made a large amount of monuments in memory of the victims of the Armenian Genocide, of which his uncle was a victim. These monuments can be found in Valence, Aix-en-Provence, Marseille, and Saint- Étienne. He awarded the Trophée Toros to the best piece of Franco-Armenian literature published each year in Marseille. R. Toros died on 29 July 2020 in Romans-sur-Isère at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French sculptors
title: R. Toros
